details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم إني أعوذ بك من الخبث والخبائث
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبْثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
details.translations: O Allah, I seek protection in You from the male and female unclean spirits.
details.reference: Al-Bukhari 1/45, Muslim 1/283. The addition of Bismillah at its beginning was reported by Said bin Mansur. See Fathul-Bari 1/244
